about_the_game:
Illustrate custom weapons with over 800 preset parts, multiple drawing tools, 100+ styles that can be applied to parts, and many other customization controls. Save your builds to load up anytime to continue working on them.

Unleash your creativity by making your own custom weapons!

This application is the advanced predecessor of the wildly popular original Weapon Builder on the Google Play store.

Features:
Snap compatible parts together (togglable under settings)
Drawing Functions to make custom shapes
Many styles can be applied such as camo patterns, wear marks, etc
Color tint any part
Extensive library of parts to choose from
Multiple presets including full weapon builds
Pistol parts included
Scale & Rotate any part
Export Builds as an image

*Disclaimer:
This game is intended for casual use only. Currently, there are no options to interact with any made weapons from this application. By downloading and launching this application you are agreeing to the privacy policy listed on this store page and in the game. All parts are for illustrative and educational use only. Any likeness to actual brands is coincidental and should not be considered representative of any specific brand/product.

* Special thanks to Dr.Noob and Skipper Lee from the legacy "Pimp My Gun" application. Credit for artwork utilized is included under the 'Credits' section of the application.
